front.title: XRUDP eXtended Reliable UDP Protocol Specification

abstract.t: XRUDP (eXtended Reliable UDP) is a modern UDP-based transport protocol providing reliable, in-order, message-oriented delivery with congestion control, security, NAT traversal, and extensibility. It is designed for scenarios demanding reliable and efficient message delivery over unreliable networks, such as real-time signaling, IoT, gaming, and edge computing. This document specifies the XRUDP packet format, state machine, negotiation, and interaction with applications.
